task_1.title: Task 1: Assessment of Quantum Computing Impact on Current Cybersecurity Infrastructure
task_1.description: Debates (N=3) + Conflict (Step 3A) with detailed expert positions, numerical ratings (1-10), cross-criticism, and iterative convergence. Experts: Quantum Physics Specialist, Cybersecurity Architect, Technology Policy Analyst.
task_1.requirements: Detailed expert positions with numerical ratings (1-10) Cross-criticism between experts Iterative convergence Comprehensive synthesis with multiple rounds

task_2.title: Task 2: Evaluation of Renewable Energy Transition Strategies for Industrial Manufacturing
task_2.description: Debates (N=3) + Consensus (Step 3B) with structured rating system, detailed arguments, and multi-round synthesis. Experts: Environmental Scientist, Industrial Economist, Energy Policy Expert.
task_2.requirements: Structured rating system Detailed arguments from each expert Multi-round synthesis process Consensus building

task_3.title: Task 3: Analysis of AI Implementation Risks in Healthcare Diagnostics
task_3.description: Generator + Critic (N=2) with comprehensive feedback loops and detailed analysis. Roles: AI Systems Developer, Medical Ethics Specialist.
task_3.requirements: Comprehensive feedback loops Detailed analysis of risks Strict logical evaluation Expert criticism and refinement

task_4.title: Task 4: Comprehensive Study on Urban Planning for Climate Resilience
task_4.description: Debates (N=4) + Conflict (Step 3A) with numerical ratings, cross-evaluation, and iterative synthesis. Experts: Climate Scientist, Urban Planner, Social Policy Expert, Infrastructure Engineer.
task_4.requirements: Four expert perspectives Numerical ratings (1-10) Cross-evaluation between all experts Iterative synthesis process

synthesis_report.summary: The SINT process successfully generated four distinct analytical tasks covering different domains and methodologies as required.
synthesis_report.compliance_check: PCG compliant: All tasks reference the original objective and context
